results.content: I felt examples were simplistic and instead of just telling how to write code for some implementation some focus should have been on underlying principles too.
results.content_html: I felt examples were simplistic and instead of just telling how to write code for some implementation some focus should have been on underlying principles too.

results.content: Somewhat outdated now (2021) ... need to update for newer new nx-console, newer lazy loading, and newer NgRx ... otherwise good.
results.content_html: Somewhat outdated now (2021) ... need to update for newer new nx-console, newer lazy loading, and newer NgRx ... otherwise good.

results.content:
Course content as per expectation. Tutor touched briefly on the benefits of Nx, that section could been expanded with some good examples.
Also tools provided by Nx (e.g. Jest) are not included in course.

Overall, satisfied with the course.
results.content_html:
Course content as per expectation. Tutor touched briefly on the benefits of Nx, that section could been expanded with some good examples.
Also tools provided by Nx (e.g. Jest) are not included in course.

Overall, satisfied with the course.

results.content: Didn't delve much into best practices or patterns to implement in Nx during the course. Showed brief explanations on how to use Angular Console and it's tools. A little demo of Auth state management in Redux,  but would not consider the pattern shown in this course a best practice for Auth state management in Nx & Angular Console - it's a tool for modulation and reusability of code.
results.content_html: Didn't delve much into best practices or patterns to implement in Nx during the course. Showed brief explanations on how to use Angular Console and it's tools. A little demo of Auth state management in Redux, but would not consider the pattern shown in this course a best practice for Auth state management in Nx & Angular Console - it's a tool for modulation and reusability of code.

results.content: I really don't like to submit low reviews but unfortunately, this course was not what I expected. Working with Nx Workspace is not just using an Angular UI and require a more in-depth explanation about best practices and how best architect Angular projects using Nx.
results.content_html: I really don't like to submit low reviews but unfortunately, this course was not what I expected. Working with Nx Workspace is not just using an Angular UI and require a more in-depth explanation about best practices and how best architect Angular projects using Nx.

results.content: I felt that should have more explanation, not just a tutorial.
